article: some supporters of the european union 's proposed constitution are urging french president jacques chirac to stop campaigning for the landmark document ahead of a crucial national referendum next week , saying his unpopularity makes him a liability .
abstract: chirac urged to keep quiet ahead of crucial vote on eu 's future
